website_summaries.verdict: Space-saving, secure-locking trash can designed fit into tight spots.
pros: Slide lock keeps contents from slipping out
Slim design that fits into tight spots
Lid shox technology provides a slow, silent close
cons: Some customers found that the lid was difficult to attach

customer_reviews.title: Engineering Fail
customer_reviews.text: I have never been more frustrated with a garbage can!!!!!!!!!! The lid will NOT clip into place. I have used my entire body weight, a hammer, and a lot of cuss words but it will not budge. Such a terrible design! DO NOT BUY THIS (unless you're roommates with the hulk and or superman).
customer_reviews.author: luvfishn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect trash can for a small living space
customer_reviews.text: I was very reluctant paying $40 for a plastic trash can, but with the impeccable reviews, I knew I was making a good decision. I've had mine for one month now and it's been great. The step to open the lid is as reliable as it was the first day I used it and the lid closes super quietly. It's a perfect trash can for those who live in a small space. The Glad tall kitchen bags (13 gallon) fit this trash can perfectly. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MissMika

customer_reviews.title: Soft plastic, but great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Good can until it breaks. Ours lasted 4 years. The hinge on the back is made of plastic and wears away over time. When the slot gets too big, the lid falls off whenever you try to open it. I don't see an obvious way to repair it. 3 stars. Edit: SimpleHuman replaced the lid under warranty. Easy and fast! Upgraded to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: William C.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SIMPLE!!
customer_reviews.text: The size is nice for narrow places, which is why I purchased this trash can, in spite of the expensive price. The lid is next to impossible to attach. I wrestled with it close to 30 minutes, read the questions and answers from people as equally as frustrated as me, watched the video link provided by the company, all to no avail. Finally, I was able to hammer it on with a mallet, only then to find out that the lock/unlock mechanism is just as difficult. I'm middle aged with average strength and can't get it to work. For the high price and these difficulties, I'd give it a 1/2 star if I could
customer_reviews.author: rg76

customer_reviews.title: Put a rock in it *
customer_reviews.text: Almost all plastic so no hinges to rust. Perfect size to fir in our small bathroom. Yes, as some reviewers noted, it can tip over when steping down hard on the foot pedal. My solution, put a good weight rock in the bottom under the bag. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tesla Sulu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Can't get cover to attach. Help! After much frustration and time trying to attach the lid I checked out a you tube video. The manufacturer could /should have added this to the instruction. Once the lid is lined up close the cover and apply a bit of pressure and you will hear/feel it snap in.
customer_reviews.author: MARY LOU MURUSKY

customer_reviews.title: A perfect product
customer_reviews.text: In my new apartment the building recycles everything. So I needed to sort before taking it to the basement. I bought four of these bins and they are wonderful. Easy to clean, neat and stylish to look at. I want the larger one for my bio-trash but I wonder just how easy it is to find liners. I use the Simplehuman liners because they fit best. I have no problem with the four that I got. However, when sizing up the larger one which I intend to buy soon, finding liners appeared problematic. However, so far, its an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You just need an 89 cent solution
customer_reviews.text: You guys. I fixed the problem - the only problem with these excellent trash cans. Baking soda box in the back is the perfect amount of counterweight. Boom!
customer_reviews.author: Holly P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good trash can but . . . .
customer_reviews.text: This is made better than the rubbermaid ones. The construction is sturdy and the bags don't interfere with the lid hinge. Unfortunately there are 2 problems that are design faults which are disappointing and really dumb. If you step on the foot pedal the entire trash can wants to tip toward you. When you release the foot pedal the can moves backward on account of wheels. I suppose if I stick rubber things on the bottom it won't roll but that won't stop it from tipping. It's too bad because otherwise it is well made and looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: amy schechter

customer_reviews.title: Bad design with lid. Can't attach. Will return
customer_reviews.text: Received trashcan today. What a disappointment! I figured it would be a big improvement being " Simplehuman" brand from our 10-year-old Rubbermaid. After spending 30 minutes trying to attach the top with no luck I decided this was way too much effort and time to attach a trash can lid. My mistake was only reading the positive reviews and not noticing that none of them were current reviews. Now after reading the current negative reviews and seeing most complaints are like mine, that it is impossible to snap the lid on it is obvious there has been a change in the manufacturing of the can and a change for the worse. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: dmcd

customer_reviews.title: Tips forward when you press foot pedal.
customer_reviews.text: This size is not worth buying. It is too small to stay level when you press down on the foot pedal. The entire can tips forward when pressing the foot pedal to open because of the light weight. I expected more from Simplehuman since I have two other stainless cans from them and love them. However, this small plastic one is just a poor design.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Simplehuman Slim Trash Can Assembly
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this retail it comes preassembled, but thankfully another reviewer described how to put it together...so I followed his directions with one modification...you have to attach the lid...first put the foot peddle metal attacher through the center hole in the lid...then turn upside down at an angle (about 40 degrees) and snap in each side separately until you hear the snap...it does require a little muscle...I gave it a 4 star because I felt for the price you pay the lid should come attached...once you put it together right, it's pretty much as described. I hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: OwKa4u

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this one
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a water filter installed on my kitchen sink which necessitates having the water tank under my sink where my trashcan used to be. I needed to buy a trashcan with a cover because it now needs to sit somewhere in my kitchen and this one looked pretty good. I really like this trashcan not only because it has a cover, but because it fits into a small space and holds a lot of trash. I use the 13 gallon Hefty trash bags and because they need to stretch across the top it's always a nice snug fit and the bag doesn't fall into the can. One of the better purchases I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: It's nice to look at and the lid works
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to look at and the lid works, but that's the only good thing. It's not stable and whenever you use it and moves around easily. All the movement makes it continually hit my kitchen wall, which in turn has taken chunks out of my wall. My husband even tried to 'jam' the wheel, but the design makes it so it still moves easily. Will be replacing...and fixing my wall.
customer_reviews.author: straeger

customer_reviews.title: No mention of "assembly required"
customer_reviews.text: Like the shape and size of this can. Hated that I had to assemble the lid onto the can. I have severe RA in both hands and after reading the reviews regarding how to get the lid on I wasn't sure I would keep this can. But, with using a nice big pair of adjustable pliers I was able to squeeze hard enough to get the hinges to snap onto the bar. Also like the idea to put an unopened gallon of water in the bottom to keep it from moving around alot.
customer_reviews.author: gramajan

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A TOTAL PIECE OF CRAP!! Lid does NOT hook onto the can in back. Totally useless. .
customer_reviews.text: You gotta be kidding me. First, the lid comes detached from the can. What a laugh. SO you have to do two steps represented by two tiny idiotic illustrations---attach the of the lid to to the top of the lever that would open it. Easy enough. But you then somehow push/maneuver/slide/what??? two notched areas onto a bar for each...and voila?????NOPE. I have examined, pushed, angled, eye-balled, pushed again and IT DOES NOT LOCK INTO PLACE. What a waste of my time to have even considered this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble. Poor quality. Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the lid was hard to clip on. The lid is also slightly deformed so it doesn't line up correctly with the rest of the container when it closes. The worst part is the wobble from pressing the foot pedal. The whole can jumps forward when you step on the pedal. I can imagine this thing tipping over the first time I step on it in a hurry. There is also a "pet lock" that is very hard to use and inconvenient. I wasted a bunch of time looking for trash cans and decided to get what seemed like a higher-end brand, only to receive a very basic, poorly designed piece of plastic with nice branding/logos
customer_reviews.author: Andres P

customer_reviews.title: Holds onto odors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the lock. It fit my space. Purchased the liners/trash bags made for it. Liners/bags show, which is unattractive. However, the main problem is that it stinks. We used it for a week. With a liner/bag. It held on to the odor so badly. Nothing was spilled in it. Sill, I cleaned it out with Clorox wipes. Didn't help. I placed a charcoal odor absorbing bag in it. We didn't use it for a week. Removed the odor absorbing bag. Left the trash can open for a week unused. Still stinks. We have used Simple Human trash cans for at least 16 years and have always been pleased. This one is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Herc Family

customer_reviews.title: Help
customer_reviews.text: Received the trash can and attempted to follow the 2 easy steps to put it together and failed miserably. The lid absolutely will not connect to the body of the can and does not seem like it ever will. It looks like there are two bars that are supposed to pop into a small cutout on the body but the two will not connect. I read a previous review that said they had the same issue and upon giving the item one star were sent a replacement lid. I am hoping upon seeing this message the company will try to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I called SimpleHuman customer service and they were like it's YOUR problem
customer_reviews.text: This comes without the lid on. You are supposed to assemble it and normally the would not be a problem for me. However, it is impossible to get the lid to snap on. I called SimpleHuman customer service and they were like it's YOUR problem. The lid should snap, she said. Well, it doesn't. I tried with the agent on the phone and she said Amazon is supposed to send these out with the lid already on. But, they didn't. So now I have to box this up and send it back. Very disappointed because it looks like it could be a good can if the lid would work right.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieM

customer_reviews.title: Tips over no matter what you do
customer_reviews.text: The size of the trash can itself was perfect for me. I got it for my bedroom. Everything about it seemed perfect... until I opened up the lid. Whenever I pressed the foot pedal, the trash can tips forward if there isn’t any weight inside of it already. Even when I opened the lid manually with my hands, it’s still tips forward! The design on how to open the lid is horrible! This is really annoying. Unless you’re going to screw this thing into the ground, go buy another trash can.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Needs bottom weight
customer_reviews.text: This little can is perfect for what I needed. I just wanted a little trash can in my room that the kitties couldn't easily jump into for their own amusement. It is a very lightweight plastic, I am going to place small weights in the bottom, so I don't push it around when I am trying to push the foot pedal. Also, the fat kitty has learned how to scoot it around to get attention. Bastard But, if you are using it as a personal little trash can, it does exactly as it's supposed to. Easy to clean, easy to change out bags (Official Simple Human ones or not)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Lid Doesn't Fit
customer_reviews.text: Seems like there's a couple of pieces missing, but I can't tell because there are no instructions to speak of to show how the lid is supposed to be put together. As it is, it does not fit together, so the foot pedal doesn't open it, and I have to put it back together every time I put trash in. It's nice looking and fits in a corner nicely, so I'll keep it, but can't recommend it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Page

customer_reviews.title: Decent trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent trash can. It is a good size and the kitchen bags fit it well. I had no difficulty putting the cover on or removing the stickers. The shape fits nicely where we have it and it looks as good as a trash can can look. It is a little light, so it does slide around a bit when the bag is empty. I like that you can really fill up the trash bag before removing it, so there is no wasted space in the bag. Also, the bags fit just right over the edge of the can, so they don't fall off or slip into the can or tear when removing them. Overall, a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Awful assembly for a simple garbage can
customer_reviews.text: This may be a great garbage can but I can’t get it assembled! Lid will not snap into hinges. I wish I read the reviews closer prior to purchasing. I now see reviews stating customers used a hammer and a c clamp; meanwhile the diagram on the garbage implies you can easily just snap it in by hand. You can’t.
customer_reviews.author: LorraineTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Worst can of my life. Returning
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I like about this can. It was to tall for where I wanted it. The lock was unusable and not practical and worst of all it is too light and because of the wheels every time I went to use the foot petal the can moved and made everything difficult. I shouldn't have to put a brick in the bottom for weight. I have never in my life had such a bad garbage can. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Shea

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this narrow trash can for over a year without any problems. Features: -The plastic lid opens with your foot. -Lid can be locked/unlocked. -There is two rear plastic wheels for rolling. -Gray finish matches well with stainless steel appliances. -Prices well considering that I’ve had it for sometime without any issues. -Easy to spray wash, necessary after a while. - All parts are plastic, except for the metal mechanism inside for opening. I’m very satisfied with this purchased.
customer_reviews.author: L.A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: Needed a slim can to fit a trash can to get it out of my kitchen. Mission accomplished. I did do all the measurements before hand to make sure it fits and it fits like a glove. Appears to be of high quality. It is a little hard to get a 13 gallon bag in it though—it’s almost like they made the trash can just a smidge too long to it’s hard to stretch the bag over the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Ok_artist

customer_reviews.title: Once you attach the lid its amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very simple design with only two parts- however attaching the lid to the base is one of the hardest things I have ever done. I watched multiple videos online and eventually had to ask my next door neighbor for help after trying for almost an hour. Once the lid is clicked into the base though it really is dog proof! I've come home to the trashcan in the middle of the room by the ripped shreds of exposed bags you can tell my dog was giving it his best shot to open this!
customer_reviews.author: EquinnwoTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to attach lid
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to attach lid on. There is no way an average person could do it. It takes 2 people, one to hold the trash bin and the other the lid in order to snap the lid in place. It didn’t come with instructions, just a sticker on lid in SPANISH so if you don’t speak Spanish you are out of luck. I don’t speak the language and didn’t know it was a requirement. A big hassle, I was ready to return it. It’s plastic, not stable and very flimsy. For the same price you can get a sturdy nice stainless steel at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Very Hard to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The can comes with the lid off. It doesn't snap on as easily as one might imagine and the directions consist of one pictogram and no words. To get the lid to snap into place, after I tried for 20 minutes, took my nephew lining it up and hitting it very hard twice. Why make the consumer do this assembly? The shipping box was big enough to accommodate it with the lid on. I was about to put it back in the box and return it when my nephew agreed to try. Still took him 5 minutes of trying. No consideration for the consumer here.
customer_reviews.author: KATHY LAVANIER

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t live up to expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these prior to purchasing a second one. My old one was great, but after a while the lid would come detached anytime you’d use the foot pedal. Anyway I love the slim design, so I decided to get a second one. The second one was incredibly difficult to attach the lid. One it finally was attached, the lock was really hard to push in. We’ve taken it off and put it back together multiple times, but the same problem still exists. Returning items is super inconvenient for me, so I’ve decided to just use it for recycling. Pretty disappointed considering the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Price and the wheels subtract from a serviceable trash can
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine and put it together...not sure if it's super easy OR if it was Amazon customer "gotDNA"'s review with included instructions was the reason this build was super easy. Either way, 4 stars for the dang cost! It's a trash can. Just needed something that wasn't going to tear my sack open but the price was the real kick in the shorts. Btw, I couldn't ever find a trash sack that would fit my old can; they would stretch and/or tear every time I'd put a new one in. This can fits my sack better. :) Wheels are kinda dumb as well. Unless you are completely indigent you should have no trouble moving this around
customer_reviews.author: Got_it

customer_reviews.title: The best trash can around!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these waste cans before I moved and loved it. I didn't bring it with me and I miss it. So I bought another and it was delivered today. It was easy to install the lid. First, I stepped on the foot pedal to raise the metal rod and inserted it into the lid. Then I closed the lid and pressed on the back to engage the two hooks on either side of the metal rod. It was very easy. I especially love that a 13 gal. trash bag will fit tightly around the entire rim. And the soft close is very handy. am very happy to have my favorite trash can again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: It’s a trashcan, what can I say...
customer_reviews.text: Using it for used cat litter and it works well for that purpose. My only complaint is that the lid doesn’t lock in the open position all the time. It does occasionally, but consistency would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I have owned.
customer_reviews.text: The first garbage trash can I owned by this manufacturer lasted about 6 to 7 years. One of the pieces at the bottom broke, but after 6 to 7 years what more can you expect. Replaced with exactly the same model and manufacturer - different color. I have been very happy with this trash can. The only reason that I gave 3 stars for the motion detection is because it does not have one - it is foot activated with a peddle. If it does have a lock function I have never had cause to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Flori

customer_reviews.title: Front heavy
customer_reviews.text: To start I do like the look of this garbage can. BUT when you step on the opener the whole garbage can tilts forward. The front is heavier then the back which is a problem. Another BUT they were cheap and would have cost to much to send back as there technically wasn't anything wrong with them, just design flaw. I think I will glue a rock inside toward the back to give it some weight and stick them in the kids bathrooms where it wont get used to much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for upstairs bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for upstairs bathroom for the children and I. Fits perfectly on the side of the sink. I love the lock feature, the fact that it’s slender to fit in such a small space and that it’s the size of a kitchen trash which is much needed in my bathroom!!! Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Israel

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with a liner. Interiors cannot be easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.text: I am not at all happy with the two garbage cans I bought. They work just fine, but they do not come with a liner and will be very difficult to clean because the inside has all kinds of cavities for the wheels. I did not realize how industrial they look-- they are basically mini dumpsters with wheels on the back. I am using them in the kitchen and they don't look good. I am disappointed. I don't think the photos are representative. There are no photos of the interior.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Quality brand name.
customer_reviews.text: I've read several reviews on the simplehuman 10 Liter / 2.6 Gallon, Compact Slim Bathroom or Office Step Trash Can, White Plastic. Many stated that the can tipped when the foot peddle was used.....this is not true. I've used the foot peddle several times before I put it in the bathroom to make sure I wanted to keep it. It works perfectly WITHOUT tipping or any other issues. It's compact in size and heavy plastic, not cheap thin plastic like what you find in the discount stores. I can also use my grocery bags as liners in it as I did my old one. I'm happy with this product, NO complaints and I would recommend the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: An attractive necessity
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these exact wastebaskets for over 12 years. It didn't break, I donated it so I could get a grey one instead of a black one I'd had. This is an excellent value. It's such a tidy look for any kitchen, and a better price than I saw anywhere else. It was delivered with the soft close lid already on, so no assembly required. It is a bit lighter in weight overall than the last one, which is fine with me. Quickly shipped. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: barbie

customer_reviews.title: Great size and shape for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this can - - its size & shape are perfect in the bathroom. The step lever is easy to use, and the inside removable liner is better than having to line it with a plastic bag, but I really wish it would stay open. Instead, if you take your foot off the lever, fhe lid closes. Because of that, it usually takes two hands to lift out the liner and to put it back. I also have another if these I use as a kitty litter disposal can with a plastic bag inside the liner. When shut, no odors escape.
customer_reviews.author: RedRosy

customer_reviews.title: Dog-tested; dog mom-approved.
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say - the setup was kind of annoying; maybe I’m an idiot but I had a tough time securing the lid on. I was concerned that the lock wasn’t going to hold off my rather smart dog but when I came home after a few hours away, I was impressed - dog had dragged the trash can into the living room, on its side, totally torn up the edges of the trash can liner that were exposed, but never got the lid off! And this is a dog who learned how to open doors from both sides. Does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: I hate it.
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is garbage! I want my money back to spend on a better brand, but I’m not going to return a used garbage can. The locking feature locks so hard that sometimes I can’t get it unlocked without setting everything down and using both hands and body weight to bust it open. EVERY. SINGLE. TIME. There is no “walk by the can and drop this small thing in,” it’s an entire process! And usually I just end up piling the trash next to the can until I have enough to make it worth my effort. Everything else about it is fine but the fact that I can barely even open it cancels out everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Lid Damaged When Received
customer_reviews.text: Well, never got to attempt putting the difficult top of the can on. We paid for “new” and must have received a “used” like everyone is talking about. One side of the plastic hinge was messed up. Maybe in the factory it melted? Or, maybe it was a repackaged return. I’m thankful for free return! BTW it’s very slim n lightweight. Great for an office; not big enough for our kitchen. P.s. packaged very nicely! Lots of styrofoam n bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: M. OlsonTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Fits easily into a small space
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this SimpleHuman garbage can. In the beginning I struggled a moment getting the lid connected but with a few tries & a little patience it popped right into place. I am surprised that this comes with a 5 year warranty. It fits quite nicely into my pantry. And the lid closes without any issues. I could easily move it closer to my sink if I’m working on something where I would like to have this closer to my work area.
customer_reviews.author: KayeGalv

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open with one hand if it’s locked. Would not recommend if you have arthritis in your hands. Other than that, it does what it’s supposed to do, if it’s locked. Lol. My dog got frustrated and dragged the van across the kitchen with no reward. Mind you, only works if it’s locked, which I forgot to do one night after cleaning the fridge. A big mess ensued. The foot peddle on works if it’s not locked, which defeats it’s purpose, but as long as that sucker is locked, digs can’t open it.
customer_reviews.author: john lathram

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: So very hard to put it together - hoping it works all right now that it is put together. Manufacturer needs to redo the hinges - until then, send better instructions as to how to put it together. Will never buy from this seller again. The only reason I am keeping it is because it fits perfectly in the limited space in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: cubfan962

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and slim; operates with ease
customer_reviews.text: We have a very narrow space for a kitchen wastebasket that needs to open from its short side. This waste container is well-made, opens and closes with ease with a sturdy step opener and fits perfectly, with none of the difficulties and irritations of swing top baskets in a narrow space. Since someone else put it together, I can't comment on difficulties some described. By the time I arrived a few days after delivery, it was all set up.
customer_reviews.author: Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for narrow areas!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this trash can to be used in a very narrow area ( less than a foot across ) as that is the only area that's available so that it can remain in the kitchen. It fits in the space great and is easy to empty / get trash bags out of . Also the slow closing lid and step peddle to open is a big plus! The locking feature is very sturdy, but is sometimes hard to unlock. I'm sure it will work in with time. Overall very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea M.

customer_reviews.title: This works well for slim areas
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after much research. I have 10.5 inches in width between my cabinets and the doorway. This works well for this size space. Because of the wheels, which normally would be an asset, I will have to make some small spacers to keep it away from both the cabinet and the wall. Because of the wheels, it rolls back to hit the wall. Because of the angle of the lid, it bumps into the cabinets. I don't fault Simplehuman for the design at all. My situation is just weird.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Blackman

customer_reviews.title: I had a VERY specific space to fill, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We had a double oven, then bought a smaller one and had a very specific gap from oven to wall. I knew this pail had the perfect color to match my kitchen, when it arrived, I was hoping it would fit and it was PERFECT! I am so happy. It is easy to use, love the step open top, also you can keep it up if you need to use it constantly for a cleaning job like peeling skins. It is definitely great looking and very big capacity!
customer_reviews.author: JKMudGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: Definitely should have listened to other reviews about it tipping over when you use the hands free stepper. It is quite annoying, and I'm surprised the company has not addressed the issue yet (shows how much they care). It also does not have a inner bucket, so if something happens to spill inside because the bag rips, it will be a hassel to clean (there's many creases inside). FYI, grocery bags can fit inside this can.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited to get this garbage can, but when I put it together (and ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this garbage can, but when I put it together (and I made sure to follow the exact instructions, since I read other reviews about having issues with the lid) the lid won't close all the way - it stays about 1/2" ajar. I don't think this will help keep any pets or odors out..
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed trashcan
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I could be so happy with a trashcan purchase. It does everything right bags don't slip out of place and can hold a lot of material. The lock can be somewhat hard to lock and unlock with one hand but it is probably for the better so dogs or kids cant open it. It's slim, moves easy but doesn't tip over and looks about as good as a non-stainless steel trashcan can look like. I hate to say it but this has been one of my best purchases of the holiday season so far!
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Great trashcan
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this can at first when looking for something to keep my dog out of the trash while away at work. I originally was looking at one that locked automatically but it was near $200. I decided to try this one for a fraction of the cost and see how the manual locking feature would do. The lock is solid and it's easier to remember to lock it manually than I thought. I thought I would forget to lock it often, but it easily became a routine. The quality of the can without the locking feature makes it work the price. Very good quality!
customer_reviews.author: kkrebs40

customer_reviews.title: wheels do not actually roll
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for the rolling wheels, because I have to walk quite a distance to empty my trash. The wheels DO technically roll but ARE NOT usable. Why? because the foot hinge arm is so low to the floor that it drags on the floor. It is basically the same height of the wheels, so the wheels are totally unusable. It was also much wider than needed for a small space. I prefer narrower and taller for our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I believe the trash can received had been a returned item, and there are scratches on the exterior. It appears that the lid was at one time taped to the can and perhaps the original purchaser had as much difficulty trying to attach the lid as we did. It was a bugger to get it attached. The lid needs to be at a bit of an angle to attach to the hinge on the can. The nice part of this is the locking lid. Using if as dog food storage container so the scratches don't matter - I would return it if it was to be in a kitchen, bath, etc.
customer_reviews.author: CristCross

customer_reviews.title: This Garbage Bin Truly Is A... Step Above
customer_reviews.text: When you're living in a tiny studio apartment, space is a premium and this garbage/recycle bin hits the mark perfectly. I have owned a few simplehuman garbage/recycle bins in the past and there was little deliberation when it came to purchase a new one for my place. This guy has served me perfectly over the past six months and I have no doubt it will do the same in the future. Have always had great luck with their customer service should things go bad. Of course they'll try to force the super-fancy-custom-made liners on you, but any basic 10 gallon liners will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dogs out of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this garbage can. It easily fits into small spaces. It looks nice enough that you can leave it out, if you do not have a closet to put it in. And best of all, and the reason I purchased it, it keeps dogs out of the garbage!!! I was having a problem of my dog getting into the garbage, and this was the solution. The easy to use lock feature keeps him out. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Vada

customer_reviews.title: We Really Needed It
customer_reviews.text: The lock feature is hard to use so if u r arthritic, weak or disabled, it will b a problem. I keep dog food in it with a heavy duty garbage bag cut to fit this. I still really like it but I have to literally punch the lock into place. Rear wheels are a great feature esp if u r dealing with dog food. It’s skinny and fits exactly where I want it to. I measured prior. Much less bending to get dry dog out and I keep a big measuring cup inside. There is a step feature to open the lid.
customer_reviews.author: TLF

customer_reviews.title: A super garbage can
customer_reviews.text: This is a well thought out product. For me simply the best plastic can I have ever used. I have had my can for 5+ years and it is still in fine working order. It is easy to clean, sturdy, fits a small kitchen perfectly and still opens and closes as it did when brand new!. I also love Simple Human's "K" bags. They fit like a glove and are extra thick so there's never a spill. Of course I yearn for one of their "super stylish/sexy" stainless models that Simple Human makes, but the price is too much for my budget! If this one ever wears out I might just ask Santa for a stainless one for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: G. R. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this can. Didn’t think I would have an opinion on a trash can but this is our first foot petal can and it really is an improvement. The slim design helps keep the footprint down. The lid is slow close so you don’t have to ever worry about a dirty lid touching your hand or arm. And the lock mechanism is great for keeping the kids or dogs out.
customer_reviews.author: vee

customer_reviews.title: save yourself the installation headache, do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: big simplehuman fan, but this garbage can is impossible. When you buy this you are get the plastic can and lid separate, and must attach the lid to the can yourself. I am a pretty handy (and relatively strong) guy, but it is impossible to click the lid onto the can. Yes i followed all the directions, tried with hammer, body weight, at different angles, lid will not snap in due to the terrible plastic click mechanism. Looking at amazon review, many people have the same issue. Very disappointing coming from a brand that suppose to prioritize ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: gaga

customer_reviews.title: Seemingly innocent trash system - you have been warned
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is bane of my existence. We have it in our camper. It refuses to open -creating a impenetrable seal and when it does, the top flies off. My entire family curses it. Many have wrestled with it using words I did not know were in their vernacular. I would get rid of it but at this point I don’t want it to win. Perhaps they are all trying to take over the world during these fragile times. The product name “Simple Human” taunts us all. Never serender.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl mcgrattan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my half bathroom. This is my second trash bin from SimpleHuman. The first one is a big 13 gallon for my ordinary trash. The only downside is this item is too light that when you step on it to open it tilts forward. The solution is to put a weight inside (bottled water or small sandbag) at the rear to prevent it from tilting forward.
customer_reviews.author: Brydge_VSP

customer_reviews.title: Holds trash and likes to put up a fight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it wasn't over $50 for a trash can and it fit in the 11" space between my fridge and wall. The biggest issue was getting the lid snapped onto the can and having to keep the pedal rod in the lids socket. The wheels on the back make it even more difficult. I am 6'2" and 235lbs. I wrastled this thing like a crocodile trying to get the lid on. But after I was done, it was ready to do its job. Three days in and no issues. Plus we made up for fighting each other and we are practically bro bruvs now.
customer_reviews.author: S.Hof

customer_reviews.title: not a up to SH standards
customer_reviews.text: If you did not tell me this was simple human I would not know it. This is NOT up to par with their other products. It is no better than any other trash can out there, the liners are lose and baggy, hanging out under the lid and there is no removable liner. The lid is not soft close. This is a disappointment from a great company, but it will hold trash...
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: I really like the simplehuman products, but this one is has a design flaw... when you step on the pedal to lift the lid, the whole back side can lifts off the ground. I recommend looking at other trash cans.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Buckland

customer_reviews.title: This is a life saver for a bad back
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver for a bad back and kiddo's to the person whom stated to put some petroleum on the hinges before putting lid on, it popped in so easy. I also put the gallon of water at the bottom as stated, no problem with it moving Love it going to get another one for recycle..If the lid ever stops opening on its own I will still keep it as it is a solid fit, no smells!!
customer_reviews.author: The Highwayman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft close. The material it’s made of is smooth, easy to clean and allows the bag to be removed easily. I like that it has wheels in the back. Makes it easy to move to sweep around it. The foot peddle feels solid. The size and shape are perfect. I measured my space before ordering and it fits exactly as I expected. I used regular, off-brand trash bags that they happened to have at our local Grocery Outlet. The lock feature, while unnecessary for me, secures the lid tightly. Only assembly required was attaching the lid. It took a moderate amount of force to snap it into place. Assembly was very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It's fine, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why garbage cans are so expensive. I just got this, and the size fits perfectly in my space. What I didn't like is that it was incredibly hard to assemble the lid--it comes unassembled. Not technically hard: I mean you have to pop in the lid into the hinges and it's a *tight* fit. I hurt my hand trying to do it. In fact, couldn't even get it done until I remembered I have a rubber mallet. Also: not too keen on how forcefully the lid swings open. When the bin is empty, the whole thing sort of swings back by the force of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Intellectual Romantic

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks great. We use it as a recycling bin inside our small kitchen. Attaching the lid was truly an ordeal, and I was so worried one of the plastic hinges would snap. The force needed to accomplish this would defy some elder's abilities, so if you purchase for your mother or grandmother, be there to help.
customer_reviews.author: chitty chitty bang bang

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE This Garbage Can!! BEST one EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this garbage can! It’s so easy to insert the trash bag (no extra bin lip to have to adjust on top of the bag) and the bag stays put tightly. The pedal always seems to work and the lock feature is extremely helpful at times. It’s strange to love a garbage can but, after going through several over the years with annoying trash bag features that I found frustrating, this one is our absolute favorite!!!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of work!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because of the price but it seemed to fit my need. The color (stone) goes nice in my kitchen - it doesn't stand out. HOWEVER, as some have noted, the lid is ridiculous. I had to use a rubber mallet plus several good whacks to attach the lid. For the price, there ought to be a better way. I was afraid I would break something but the whacks worked. I guess the bin gets an A++ for durability.
customer_reviews.author: JLBRN

customer_reviews.title: Yes, the lid is hard to attach
customer_reviews.text: So I read all the reviews that gave tips on how to attach the lid. The winner for me was a combination of pressure with adding just a dash of clear soap dish washing liquid to each spool and it clicked on! The slow, soft close is really nice for this price point. Other than not expecting how difficult it would be to attach the lid, this container is perfect for the room/project that I needed. Don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.author: BelmontShopper

customer_reviews.title: hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Lid was detached when it shipped. It took 3 different people before we found someone strong enough to attach it. Thought I may have to return it if I could not find someone able to get the lid to snap back on after almost a week of disuse. Now that lit is attached it is a good size for next to kitchen counter, lock works, peddle works, looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: The husband loves it & can't stop raving about it.
customer_reviews.text: It's functional & works great for our small space. We bought 2 for trash & recycling. My husband loves it. We of course thought it was quite overpriced, but I guess quality is better than quantity. Had to explain to him that the brand SimpleHuman was one of the top trash makers for him to forget how much it cost.😁 Definitely would recommend it for anyone looking for a trash can for their small kitchen or home.
customer_reviews.author: Tomay Xiong

customer_reviews.title: This one's a dud!
customer_reviews.text: The product came with an out of form bottom. The top doesn't fit correctly. Therefore, the top doesn't close. I am trying to reshape the bottom in the sun. Basically it's cheap.
customer_reviews.author: james mantell

customer_reviews.title: Great little size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for under my kitchen sink. I've listened to the advice given by other reviewers, and put a used scented candle jar but needs the bag, so when I step on the pedal the can doesn't tip over. I've only had it for a couple of days, so I can't speak to how long it's going to last or how much I'm going to love it. But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Can leaks
customer_reviews.text: When you purchase a trash can for the kitchen you expect it not to leak. I have not had an issue till now. I love the way it works and rolls. However my bag liner must had a hole in it and I had liquid all over my kitchen floor. Now if you are not going to put any liquids in can, I would give it 5 stars. In other words, great can, but leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: It's OK but more could be changed
customer_reviews.text: Decent trash can. I like how the lid slowly lowers after you take your foot off (no more slamming). What surprised me is just how hard the lid was to put on, like all of the other reviews. They need to engineer a better method. With that said, at $40 I expected it to be a lot more sturdy that this. You need to buy an extra weight plate for the bottom so it won't slide around when it's not full. This effectively prices me out because if I didn't have to buy the weight plate I could just get a nicer aluminum can for the same amount.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality but Locking Device Not Easy
customer_reviews.text: The look and quality and function of this trash can is great. But the locking function of it is not easy to use. You really need to grab hold with both hands and push quite hard to lock it and the same to unlock it. No chance of doing it one handed with trash in your other hand. I'm a big strong guy too. I bought it so my dog could not get in the can but he locking device ended up too cumbersome to constantly open and close. I ended up installing a gate at the kitchen entrance instead.
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: NICE look.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the look of this pail. It's sleek and fits into smaller spaces nicely. I also like that it's "simple" - no complicated mechanical or electronic pieces to break or go awry. Its only drawback is its cost. When did a simple kitchen garbage can with a lid become so valuable that its price SOARED? (And this isn't the only example.) Crazy!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the pups out of the trash
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. It works wonderfully to keep our nosy, big dogs out of the trash. The original one went to the bathroom, while the new one is in the kitchen. The lock is tight for awhile when you first use it, but don't worry, it becomes easier as time goes on. I love not having to chase our puppy down because she has garbage in her mouth or worrying that she ate something she shouldn't...not to mention cleaning up garbage strewn all over the floor.
customer_reviews.author: GHP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed it for
customer_reviews.text: We found a tiny puppy in the woods and ended up adopting him. We collect his poop in environmentally / decomposing bags and purchased this to store everything until trash day. We live in the country and animals (really the vultures) like to mess with these - go figure) so this is working out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: All pets are rescues

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I received this as house warning present last year and our family likes it. It’s what we were looking for. It doesn’t have a motion detector which doesn’t bother as since we have a puppy and wouldn’t want him to possibly get into it. Pros: it’s tall enough and thin enough to fit at the end of the bar in our apartment. You have the option to look it. Cons: the lock feature is handy but kind of hard to manuver some times. It doesn’t always keep the smell inside but that could also be because we don’t like fighting with the to lock feature.
customer_reviews.author: SweetAsApplePie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! Especially for Recyclables.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a pretty rattan shopping basked that I used for recyclable. It finally gave out after 15 years. I really needed something to replace, and then I stumbled upon this. It is perfect for our needs. It doesn't take a lot of space, it's sleek, it has a pedal to open it and the lid does not come crashing down. It also has wheels that help a lot to transport it from the kitchen to the bin in our garage. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Geekytaitai

customer_reviews.title: Disapponted
customer_reviews.text: For the price and all the hype around the brand, I expected something better. It took 30 minutes to put the lid on. I had to watch A video and do a search online to figure out how to do it. Unless you lock it, the lid is not that secure vs a cheaper brand garbage can I have that locks secure and easily comes back up. If you lock it, the foot pedal does not lift it up which defeats the purpose. The plastic is also flimsier then the cheaper garbage can I have from a local department store.
customer_reviews.author: shanna

customer_reviews.title: Well-made little trash can
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little trash can. The one I purchased over 5 yrs ago just broke. I was very excited to find the same exact one available on Amazon. Yes you can line it with grocery store plastic bags. It’s incredibly convenient and well-made. Give this little guy a try. And at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Durable, just the right size, and the warranty seals the deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great trash can for the specific needs of our space. Its narrow profile fits right where we need it. Even though it's plastic, it feels durable. It has already outlasted the metal trash can it replaced, which broke and left us stranded. The Simplehuman warranty helps me feel secure that if anything goes wrong, I won't be stuck shopping for another new trash can.
customer_reviews.author: J-Pop

customer_reviews.title: Lid Not easy to install but Ok basic trash bin
customer_reviews.text: This is ok as a basic trash bin. The lid is not pre-assembled and is not easy to install due to the hooks do not snap easily into place and I still haven't been able to snap my lid hooks into place so the lift pedal can work. Next time I get a handy man to do some work for me I'll see if they can help with this. I think this is small or compact enough item that the lid should have been pre-installed.
customer_reviews.author: ZenaA-SpiritWarrior

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I needed. I wanted matching trash and recycle cans for a very visible area in my kitchen. I also needed something with a locking lid to keep the dogs out. These are perfect. I love them. Plus they come with a 5 year warranty. The review with the tip on how to get the lid on was extremely helpful. That made it very easy once I read that review and tried it that way the lids went on easily. I did struggle with that part until I read that review. My only suggestion is that instructions of how to install the lid should be included with the product. I would highly recommend this can.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I just got it and barely used it but so far I love it (can you love a trash can?) I ordered one from another manufacturer and promptly returned it. It was cheaply made, poorly crafted molded plastic. With this Simple Humam version you can see the craftsmanship, yes I'm using that word for a plastic trash can! It was only $10 more than the cheaply made version and comes with a 5-year guarantee. The hook that attaches the lid and makes it open and close is metal, not plastic like my last Rubbermaid trash can that broke in less than a year. Plus it's slim design is going to let me add a recycling can...extra credit!
customer_reviews.author: Anna, Huntington Beach CA

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. And 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small little trash can for my make up area and it was 1/2 the price on her than anywhere else. This fits perfectly and is the same size as my bathroom trash so I already had the trash bags (bonus). I definitely recommend this as it’s pretty good quality and it’s light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting to get my big bulky garbage can out of sight in my kitchen for months. Finally after it broke I could justify buying a new garbage can. This one is perfect. Slides right next to my washer and dryer tucked away and out of sight. Lid locks nice and easy as well. The wheels on the back are a bit useless IMO but I guess a nice feature if you have a need to wheel your garbage can around for some odd reason.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Osborne

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS NOT LEAKPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I dumped leftover soup into the trash and lifted the bag out only to find there was a hole in the bag. I mopped up the mess and then put water in the trash can to swish around and get the solid bits to flush out. I swished it and nasty liquid went projectile flying all over my kitchen. I’m furious that I spent $40 on what I thought was a high quality trash can only to find that it doesn’t even hold liquid. I’ll be replacing this trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Reiber

customer_reviews.title: Best Trash Bin We Have Ever Owned!
customer_reviews.text: After a hell of a struggle to get the Pet Latch to slide (ample amounts of WD40) we quickly appreciated the attention to detail this trash bin offers. 1) Smooth operation with efficient use of space. 2) Snug closing & quiet lid 3) Sturdy foot pedal 4) Uses standard tall trash liners 5) Fits perfectly into narrow spaces One complaint: It is impossible to register this particular model. We have tried repeatedly but the website.
customer_reviews.author: Physics Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: This trash can is very nice! The lid works well and it fits into a small space in my kitchen. I don't have room for a big can. A little more weight in the bottom of it would be nice though. I had to put a brick in the bottom to keep it from falling over and to help weigh it down. Worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: iGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lid will NOT assemble
customer_reviews.text: This product should have shipped fully assembled. The lid absolutely will not snap into place. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

product_meta.title: simplehuman 40 Liter / 10.6 Gallon Slim Kitchen Step Trash Can With Secure Slide Lock, Grey Plastic
product_meta.description:
Color:GreyOur slim plastic step can has a space-efficient shape that fits perfectly in tight spaces, like between cabinets. The strong steel pedal is designed to last, and our patented lid shox technology ensures a smooth, silent close every time. A slide lock helps keep trash in and pets and curious children out. Our code K liner fits this can perfectly - no bunching or slipping for a cleaner trash experience.

BRAND STORY
We design tools that help people become more efficient at home.

Day to day life has room for improvement. That's the basic thinking behind simplehuman. Many activities in our daily routine are so basic that we take them for granted. Washing our hands, cleaning up after a meal, grooming and prepping our appearance. Through innovation and new technologies, we find ways to streamline these simple tasks. We call our products tools for efficient living.
feature_bullets: 5-YEAR WARRANTY - We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last in tough environments like your home — for years.
CODE K CUSTOM FIT LINERS – Enhance your trash experience with extra-strong and durable trash bags that fit this can perfectly for a cleaner trash experience.
LOCK THE LID SHUT - A slide lock securely locks the lid to help keep pets and curious children from getting into the trash.
STRONG STEEL PEDAL - Engineered to last 150,000 steps - that's more than 20 steps a day for 20 years.
SILENT CLOSE LID - Patented lid shox technology controls the motion of the lid for a slow, silent, quiet close – no banging or loud noises.
SPACE-EFFICIENT SLIM SHAPE – Designed to make the most of tight spaces.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars9,202 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
